tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Finished 145th in the Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Primary tour was PGA TOUR Canada. Played 12 tournaments, making eight cuts, with his best finish a top-10 at The Players Cup (T9) in July. Recorded one other top-15, a T12 at the previous week's SIGA Dakota Dunes Open.

2013: Qualified for the U.S. Open (missed cut).

2011: Missed the cut in his lone PGA TOUR start, at the Mayakoba Golf Classic.

2009: Played in three PGA TOUR Canada events. Made one cut, resulting in a T46.

2008: In 10 events, made six cuts, which included three top-25s (T16, T19, T25).

2008, 2009 and 2011: Played in one Web.com Tour event each year. Missed two cuts and finished T34 in Kansas City in 2009.

Misc: Has multiple wins on the Gateway Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was 2001 Colorado State High School champion...Was 2004 Conference USA individual champion.
tourBios.personal: Attended Poudre High School in Fort Collins, Colo...Uncle, Gerald Skinner, is an NFL offensive lineman with the Green Bay Packers...Earliest golf memory is chipping in on consecutive holes to win the state championship...First tee intro song would be "What A Man" by Salt n' Pepper...Likes golf because "it's the only sport where you always have the ball."...If not a professional golfer would be college football analyst...Favorites include TCU, the Denver Broncos and the Denver Nuggets, "The Wife" and "Family Guy" (TV), "Casino" (movie) and Eminem and Darius Rucker...Best sporting event attended was 2010 Rose Bowl, won by TCU...Would like to trade places with Jimmy Fallon for a day "because I want my own TV show...Dream foursome would include Fallon, Jamie Foxx and Joe Pesci...Bucket list include wanting to be in a movie.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T34th in 2009 at the Christmas In October Presented by Kansas City Crusaders.
